assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All procedures followed were in accordance with the ethical standards. This study was approved by the Research Ethics Committee (CPP SOOM III: Comité de Protection des Personnes Sud-Ouest et Outre-Mer III). Informed consent was obtained from all participants included in this study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.
